mapper.sql: id, room_id, device_name, local_name, num, u_id, create_time, code
mapper.insert: insert into t_apply (id, room_id, device_name, local_name, num, u_id, create_time, code) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_apply
id,
room_id,

code,

mapper.update:
update t_apply
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
local_name = #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_apply set room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, local_name = #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id as id, room_id as roomId, device_name as deviceName, t.id as uid,local_name as localName,num, t.name as name,create_time as createTime, code from t_apply a join t_user_info t on a.u_id=t.id
